channel.title: Web Development on Quick Reference
channel.description: Recent content in Web Development on Quick Reference

item.title: A Complete Guide to Auth in React with Axios, JWT and Context API
item.description: Comprehensive guide to implementing authentication in React with token refresh and role-based access using Context API and Axios.

item.title: React 19 New Features
item.description: Explore the new features introduced in React 19, including the useId hook and use API for enhanced component development.

item.title: DRF DAY 6
item.description: A detailed guide Hyperlinked Identity Field and Hyperlinked Related Field in Django Rest Framework.

item.title: DRF - DAY 5
item.description: A detailed guide on Parsers, Renderers, and Pagination in Django Rest Framework.

item.title: Using React Hook Form
item.description: Learn how to use React Hook Form to manage form state and validation in your React applications.

item.title: DRF : Day 4
item.description: Learn how to manage permissions and throttling in Django REST framework, including custom permissions and rate limiting.

item.title: DRF : Day 3
item.description: Learn how to implement JWT authentication in Django REST framework, including installation, configuration, and usage.

item.title: DRF : Day 2
item.description: A detailed guide on various serializer fields in Django Rest Framework, including their usage and validation options.

item.title: DRF - DAY 1
item.description: An in-depth guide to Django Rest Framework, covering installation, views, serializers, and more.

item.title: Django : Day 10
item.description: Learn this if you want to continue with Django Templates based website

item.title: Django : Day 9
item.description: Learn how to send emails, use middleware, generate tokens, and manage users in Django.

item.title: Django : Day 8
item.description: Learn how to manage user sessions in Django, including adding, retrieving, modifying, and deleting session data.

item.title: Django : Day 7
item.description: Learn how to handle form data and file uploads in Django, including setting up media files, serving media files, and using FileField and ImageField.

item.title: Django: Day 6
item.description: Comprehensive overview of Django settings and configuration including database setup, security settings, middleware, templates, and core project configuration options.

item.title: Django: Day 1
item.description: A comprehensive guide to Django fundamentals covering project setup, apps, routing, views, and static file handling - essential concepts for learning Django REST Framework.

item.title: Deploying React App
item.description: Learn how to build and deploy a React app to various static file servers like Netlify, Vercel, and GitHub Pages.

item.title: React : Day 14
item.description: A comprehensive guide on React Router Dom for handling routing in React applications including route definitions, navigation, layouts, and dynamic routes.

item.title: React : Day 11
item.description: A comprehensive guide on making server requests in React, creating custom hooks, and handling forms.

item.title: React : Day 10
item.description: A comprehensive guide on optimizing React applications using memo, useCallback and useMemo hooks.

item.description: A comprehensive guide on using the useEffect hook in React applications.

item.title: React : Day 8
item.description: A comprehensive guide on understanding prop drilling and using the Context API in React applications.

item.title: React : Day 7
item.description: A comprehensive guide on advanced React hooks including useRef, forwarding refs, useImperativeHandle and Portals in React applications.

item.title: React : Day 5
item.description: A comprehensive guide on how to style React components using inline styles, external styles, dynamic styles, and CSS modules.

item.title: React : Day 6
item.description: A comprehensive guide on how to debug React applications using various methods including console.log, Strict Mode, and React Developer Tools.

item.title: React : Day 3
item.description: Deep dive into React's advanced concepts including Fragments, JSX Props, Component Isolation, and State Management patterns

item.description: An in-depth guide to understanding and using hooks in React, including rules and examples.

item.description: A comprehensive guide for creating and managing React projects, components, and folder structures.

item.description: A comprehensive guide covering DOM manipulation And Events

item.title: Asynchronous Programming in JavaScript
item.description: A comprehensive guide covering asynchronous programming in JavaScript, including promises and async/await.

item.title: JavaScript Reference Behavior: Objects and Arrays
item.description: Understanding reference types in JavaScript, focusing on objects and arrays, and their behavior with methods like filter() and find().

item.title: JavaScript Reference Guide
item.description: A comprehensive guide covering JavaScript fundamentals, DOM manipulation, error handling, and asynchronous programming.
